name: Xanadu Bureaucracy of the Seraphim Incorruptible
name_original: Xanadu Bureaucracy of the Seraphim Incorruptible
description:
Important! in the first stage, if you kill the skeletons individually with a large time gap between each other, the game doesn't load the next level, because the old dead skeleton will unload after dying for a while, make sure to kill them either at the same time or within a small time frame between each kill, the three of them have to be dead before one of them unloads meaning all dead bodies present, I am sorry for the inconvenience.

You bought the usual skittles from your local 6-TWELVE, to your surprise you accidentally bought the sour kind(a.k.a. the bad one), you kindly ask for a refund, but Skelly the manager refuses,

 -" I shall file an official complaint", you threaten kindly,

-" try me", answers Skelly glaringly,

alas justice is now in your hands to deliver, by sword or by gun, smite the tyrannical bureaucrats who abuse their powers, and deliver your complaint safely to 6-TWELVE Headquarters.

CONTROLS:

WASD keys for Movement.

[ walking doesn't need explanation, or does it? ]

Shift key to dash. (cannot be used mid-air, but could be used right before jumping for a good momentum boost)

E key for upward strike to launch your enemies in the air a.k.a "airtime baby!"

Left mouse button for shooting your gun.

Right mouse button for Slashing with your sword. (Hold the button to charge the attack for more Damage, can do one slash mid-air)

Middle mouse button for stabbing a.k.a. "stick it in"

Q key for using counter-attack. (contrary to name it only does a counter and not a strike-back after it)

Num 1,2,3 for changing guns. (in order of shotgun, revolver, grapple gun)

Pro-Tip:

These orange thingies are grapple points that you use the grapple gun to grapple on, try shooting them and holding the shoot button with the grapple gun.

Credits:

Me:  pretty much everything.

Unity Asset Store: goblin    ranger     industrial set     robot     barbarian     skeleton

many thanks to Elbolilloduro for the 6-TWELVE Idea and diner assets
